title: Leak reveals details of Qualcomm’s next Snapdragon 7 series SoC
content:
Qualcomm is reportedly gearing up to launch a new mid-range Snapdragon 7 series chipset. Although the company hasn’t released any official information about the SoC, renowned leaker Digital Chat Station claims it will feature ARM Cortex-A710 and Cortex-A510 cores. In a recent post on the Chinese microblogging platform Weibo, Digital Chat Station says that the upcoming

The post Leak reveals details of Qualcomm’s next Snapdragon 7 series SoC appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Leaked specifications of an upcoming Snapdragon 7 series chip reveal that it could be a premium mid-tier offering. Read on to learn more.
